body_html: Yes, but it depends on fixing all of the legacy code that uses the vestigial Tensor.shape property internally. Assuming this eventually happens, I'd be inclined to add Tensor.shape as an alias for Tensor.get_shape(), instead of accepting this PR.
body_text: Yes, but it depends on fixing all of the legacy code that uses the vestigial Tensor.shape property internally. Assuming this eventually happens, I'd be inclined to add Tensor.shape as an alias for Tensor.get_shape(), instead of accepting this PR.
body: Yes, but it depends on fixing all of the legacy code that uses the vestigial `Tensor.shape` property internally. Assuming this eventually happens, I'd be inclined to add `Tensor.shape` as an alias for `Tensor.get_shape()`, instead of accepting this PR.
